wikipedia_page.main: Oluwasemilogo Adesewo Ibidapo Ajayi (born 9 November 1993) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a defender or defensive midfielder for EFL Championship club West Bromwich Albion and the Nigeria national football team.

response: *Semi Ajayi, footballer who plays for West Bromwich Albion and the Nigeria national football team

The 2020-21 season saw Wolves and Albion- who had won promotion the season before- clash for the first time in 9 years. Their first meeting at the Molineux on the 16th January 2021 ended in a 3-2 win for Albion, with two penalties from Matheus Pereira and a goal from Semi Ajayi winning the match for WBA.
